title: Squish
overview: Squish is a comedy about an amoeba. Who wears a ballcap. His name is Squish. And oddly enough, he acts like all those other kids you might meet in a middle school. If those other kids were amoeba, paramecium, and microbes.This whole town of Small Pond where Squish lives looks suspiciously like our own world, with its tidy streets and schools and homes. But it's inhabited solely by single-celled creatures with a few unicellular quirks. Algae are the cool kids, parasites can't be trusted and bacteria always makes a mess of everything…
